HomeSection.title: Bringing Your Vision to Life—Together!
HomeSection.description: Transform Your Business with Cutting-Edge Web & Mobile Solutions
HomeSection.description2: At LT Coding, we help SMEs stay ahead with innovative web & mobile development tailored to their unique needs.

item1.title: Proven Track Record
item1.description: 7+ years of experience, 30+ successful projects, and a track record of delivering impactful digital solutions.

item2.title: Expert Team
item2.description: A highly skilled team of developers, designers, and strategists dedicated to innovation and results.

item3.title: Tailored, Scalable Solutions
item3.description: Custom-built web and mobile solutions designed to grow with your business needs.

item4.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
item4.description: Leveraging the latest tech, including AI-driven solutions, custom CMS, and seamless integrations.

item5.title: Global Reach, Local Understanding
item5.description: Experience working with businesses worldwide while adapting to local market needs.

item6.title: Results-Driven Approach
item6.description: A strategic focus on delivering measurable growth, ensuring every project drives success.

HomeOurServices.title: Our Services
HomeOurServices.description1: At LT Coding, we specialize in creating custom websites and mobile applications to meet diverse business needs.. Our team builds solutions that are visually stunning, highly functional, and optimized for seamless user experiences across all devices..
HomeOurServices.buttonText: Find the Perfect Web Solution for Your Business

item1.title: Landing Pages
item1.description: We design engaging, high-converting landing pages optimized for  lead generation, product promotion, and brand awareness. Our pages are built for speed and mobile responsiveness to ensure maximum impact..

item2.title: Custom CMS Websites
item2.description: Take full control of your website's content with our custom CMS solutions. Whether you need a personal blog, portfolio, or a complex enterprise site, we build CMS websites that are scalable, easy to manage and mobile-friendly.

item3.title: E-Commerce Websites
item3.description: Transform your online store with our fully-featured e-commerce websites and mobile commerce apps. We integrate secure payment gateways, shopping cart solutions, inventory management, and a seamless checkout experience optimized for both web and mobile users.

item4.title: Corporate Websites
item4.description: Showcase your business with a professional, custom-built corporate website or a business app. We design user-friendly, secure solutions that reflect your brand identity and enhance communication with your audience.

item5.title: Portfolio Websites & Mobile Showcases
item5.description: For creatives and businesses looking to showcase their work, we build sleek, modern portfolio websites mobile-friendly showcase apps that present your projects, achievements, and expertise in an engaging way.

item6.title: Blog Websites
item6.description: Whether you’re looking to create a personal blog or a content-driven site, we build blog websites that are easy to maintain, mobile-friendly, and optimized for search engines.

item7.title: Educational Websites & Learning Apps
item7.description: We develop interactive educational platforms and mobile learning apps that facilitate online courses, student engagement, and knowledge sharing. Our solutions include course management, user interaction features, and mobile accessibility.

item8.title: Event Websites & Mobile Event Apps
item8.description: Planning an event? We create dedicated websites dynamic event websites and mobile event apps that provide event details, manage registrations, and keep attendees informed with real-time updates and interactive features.

HomeOurClients.title: Our Clients, Our Success
HomeOurClients.description2: At LT Coding, we turn ideas into impactful web & mobile solutions, driving innovation and empowering businesses for a future of growth and success.

item1.title: Chrelo
item1.description: Property Rental Platform: Nationwide Platform Specializing in Short-Term Property Rentals for Relocations and Temporary Housing Needs.

item2.title: Booking FWI
item2.description: Travel Booking Solution: Vacation Booking Platform for the French West Indies, Offering Convenient and Secure Booking Options.

item3.title: Siamoods
item3.description: E-Commerce Solution: Fashion Platform Offering a Unique Blend of Contemporary Styles and Traditional Craftsmanship.

item4.title: Armenia Commerce
item4.description: E-Commerce Solution: Connecting Armenian Businesses with Global Markets through an Easy-to-Use Online Platform.

item5.title: Armenia Realty
item5.description: Real Estate Solution: A Platform Connecting Buyers and Sellers in Armenia for Seamless Property Transactions.

item1.name: Gary Segal
item1.testimonial: The team brought our vision to life with dedication, creativity, and technical expertise. They were attentive, responsive, and made the whole process smooth and stress-free. Thrilled with the final product!

item2.name: Emily K.
item2.testimonial: They turned our idea for a customizable online store into a seamless, user-friendly platform. Their attention to detail and professionalism exceeded expectations. Highly recommended!

item3.name: Alan M.
item3.testimonial: They transformed our vision into a user-friendly and visually appealing booking website. Their expertise, innovative approach, and timely delivery made the experience outstanding!

Footer.aboutText: LT Coding – Building custom websites and digital solutions to help your business grow. For inquiries, reach us at. At LT Coding, we craft bespoke digital experiences that empower businesses to thrive in the online world. As a full-service web and mobile development agency based in Armenia, we combine technical expertise with creative vision to deliver solutions that drive real business results.

AboutUs.partnershipDescription: At LT Coding, we specialize in crafting custom web and mobile solutions designed to help businesses succeed in the digital world. Based in Armenia, our journey began in 2021 with a small, passionate team driven by the desire to turn knowledge and creativity into innovative solutions. Since then, we've grown into a trusted partner for businesses of all sizes, offering cutting-edge software development services and transformative technology solutions.
AboutUs.missionDescription: We aim to empower businesses with advanced web development services that drive growth, efficiency, and innovation. Whether creating custom software solutions or optimizing user experiences, we are committed to delivering value and results tailored to your needs.

apartItem1.title: Innovative Solutions
apartItem1.description: We combine creativity with the latest technologies like React.js, Laravel, and API integrations to deliver unique web solutions.

apartItem2.title: Holistic Approach
apartItem2.description: Beyond coding, we partner with you to set clear digital goals and achieve them efficiently.

apartItem3.title: End-to-End Support
apartItem3.description: From initial research to deployment and testing, we handle every stage of product development.

apartItem4.title: Focus on Local and Global Impact
apartItem4.description: We prioritize balanced growth in Armenia's IT sector while addressing global market demands.

AboutUs.contactUsHeading: Let’s Bring Your Vision to Life—Contact Us Now!
AboutUs.teamDescription: At LT Coding, we believe our people are our greatest strength. Our success is powered by a collaborative team of over 10 skilled professionals who bring passion and expertise to every project. Meet our core team:
AboutUs.ceoMessage: At LT Coding, we don’t just build software; we create solutions that empower businesses to thrive in today’s ever-changing digital landscape. With innovation at our core, we are passionate about making technology accessible, scalable, and transformative for our clients. Our commitment to excellence, collaboration, and creativity drives us to go beyond expectations. Let’s build the future together.

Services.title: Our Expertise in Website Development
Services.description: We specialize in creating tailored websites and mobile solutions that drive engagement and business growth.

landing.title: Landing Pages
landing.description: We design engaging, high-converting landing pages optimized for  lead generation, product promotion, and brand awareness. Our pages are built for speed and mobile responsiveness to ensure maximum impact..

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: High-converting landing pages optimized for lead generation, product promotion, and brand awareness.  Designed for speed and mobile responsiveness.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We design sleek, focused landing pages that encourage specific actions like lead capture or product sign-ups. Ensuring your page is optimized for mobile users and loads quickly for a seamless experience.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A visually attractive, high-converting landing page. Increased lead capture and product promotion success.

customCMS.title: Custom CMS Websites
customCMS.description: Take full control of your website's content with our custom CMS solutions. Whether you need a personal blog, portfolio, or a complex enterprise site, we build CMS websites that are scalable, easy to manage and mobile-friendly.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: Custom-built CMS platforms that provide control over your website content. Scalable solutions for blogs, portfolios, and enterprise-level sites. Mobile-friendly design.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We develop CMS websites tailored to your needs, easy to manage and update. We ensure your platform is SEO-friendly and can scale with your business growth.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A user-friendly CMS platform that allows effortless content updates. A flexible solution that grows with your business.

eCommerce.title: E-Commerce Websites & Mobile Stores
eCommerce.description: Transform your online store with our fully-featured e-commerce websites and mobile commerce apps. We integrate secure payment gateways, shopping cart solutions, inventory management, and a seamless checkout experience optimized for both web and mobile users.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: Fully integrated e-commerce platforms with secure payment gateways, shopping cart solutions, inventory management, and optimized for both web and mobile.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We build responsive e-commerce websites and mobile commerce apps tailored to your brand. We integrate essential features for seamless shopping experiences.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A secure, high-performance online store for both web and mobile. Increased online sales and improved customer satisfaction.

corporate.title: Corporate Websites & Business Apps
corporate.description: Showcase your business with a professional, custom-built corporate website or a business app. We design user-friendly, secure solutions that reflect your brand identity and enhance communication with your audience.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: Professional, custom-built corporate websites and business apps that reflect your brand identity. User-friendly and secure platforms for communication.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We design corporate websites and apps that enhance communication, brand presence, and streamline business processes. We ensure easy navigation and a professional look.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A polished, professional website that enhances your brand's credibility.A platform that helps you effectively communicate with your audience.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Websites & Mobile Showcases
portfolio.description: Present your skills and projects with a visually striking portfolio website or mobile showcase. We craft personalized, responsive designs that effectively display your work, engage your audience, and make a powerful impact on potential clients.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: Modern, sleek portfolio websites and mobile-friendly showcase apps that highlight your work and achievements. Optimized for visual impact and user experience.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We create portfolio websites and apps that effectively present your projects and expertise. We ensure intuitive design and easy navigation for an engaging experience.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A polished portfolio that highlights your work and expertise.A professional, user-friendly platform to present your creative projects.

blog.title: Blog Websites & Content Apps
blog.description: Whether you’re looking to create a personal blog or a content-driven site, we build blog websites that are easy to maintain, mobile-friendly, and optimized for search engines.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: SEO-optimized blog websites and content-driven mobile apps. Mobile-friendly design for easy content access on any device.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We build blog websites and mobile apps that are easy to maintain and optimized for SEO. We ensure a smooth, intuitive design for content creation and engagement.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A fully optimized, easy-to-maintain blog.An engaging platform to share your thoughts, ideas, or stories with a broad audience.

educational.title: Educational Websites & Learning Apps
educational.description: We develop interactive educational platforms and mobile learning apps that facilitate online courses, student engagement, and knowledge sharing. Our solutions include course management, user interaction features, and mobile accessibility.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: Interactive educational platforms with course management tools, student interaction features, and mobile accessibility.

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We develop learning platforms and mobile apps that foster online courses, student engagement, and knowledge sharing. We integrate interactive features like quizzes and forums.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A dynamic, easy-to-navigate educational platform. An enhanced user experience for both students and educators.

event.title: Event Websites & Mobile Event Apps
event.description: Planning an event? We create dedicated websites dynamic event websites and mobile event apps that provide event details, manage registrations, and keep attendees informed with real-time updates and interactive features.

item1.title: What’s Included:
item1.description: Event-specific websites with event details, registration systems, and real-time updates. Mobile event apps with interactive features

item2.title: What We Do:
item2.description: We create engaging event websites and apps that manage registrations and provide event details. We integrate features like schedules, live updates, and interactive elements to enhance attendee experience.

item3.title: What You Get:
item3.description: A comprehensive website or app for event management.Seamless atendee experiences with real-time information and engagement

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: At LT Coding, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or interact with our services. By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

items.title: Information We Collect
items.description: We collect personal information when you visit our website, book a call, request a proposal, or interact with our services. This may include:
items: Other relevant data provided during communication

items.title: How We Use Your Information
items.description: We use the collected data to:
items: Respond to inquiries and provide customer support
Send marketing materials, updates, and newsletters (with your consent)
Analyze website usage to enhance user experience

items.title: Data Protection and Security
items.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Your data is stored securely and is only accessible by authorized personnel.

items.title: Sharing Your Information
items.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners who assist in delivering our services, provided they agree to keep the information confidential.

items.title: Cookies and Tracking
items.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies help us analyze website traffic and customize content. You can adjust your browser settings to block cookies, but this may limit certain functionalities of the site.

items.title: Your Rights
items.description: You have the right to:
items: Access, update, or correct your personal information
Request the deletion of your data
Withdraw consent for marketing communications at any time To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@lt-coding.com.

items.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
items.description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any updates will be posted on this page, and the revised policy will apply from the date of publication.

items.title: Contact Us
items.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at:

Privacy.summary: By using our website, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.

Terms.title: Terms & Conditions
Terms.description: Welcome to LT Coding! By using our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our site or engaging with our services. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our website.

items.title: Acceptance of Terms
items.description: By accessing or using the LT Coding website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of the terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing our website.

items.title: Use of Website
items.description: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the LT Coding website for personal, non-commercial purposes. You agree not to use the website for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage or disable the website.

items.title: Services Provided
items.description: LT Coding offers a variety of web development services, including front-end and back-end development, SEO, custom web applications, e-commerce solutions, and more. Details of these services are outlined on our website. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at our discretion.

items.title: Client Responsibilities
items.description: As a client, you agree to provide accurate, up-to-date, and complete information necessary for the delivery of services. You are responsible for ensuring that your content and materials comply with applicable laws and do not infringe on any third-party rights.

items.title: Payment and Fees
items.description: All fees for services will be clearly stated in the proposal or agreement. Payment terms are agreed upon between LT Coding and the client at the time of booking or contract signing. Late payments may incur additional fees or delays in the completion of services.

items.title: Intellectual Property
items.description: LT Coding retains ownership of all intellectual property rights associated with the work we create, including code, designs, and proprietary software, unless otherwise specified in writing. Upon full payment for services, you are granted a license to use the final deliverables for their intended purpose.

items.title: Confidentiality
items.description: Both LT Coding and clients agree to keep confidential any proprietary or sensitive information shared during the course of the project. This includes, but is not limited to, business strategies, marketing plans, and customer data.

items.title: Limitation of Liability
items.description: LT Coding will not be held liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or website. Our liability is limited to the total amount paid by the client for the specific service provided.

items.title: Termination
items.description: LT Coding reserves the right to terminate any agreement or service if the client breaches these Terms and Conditions or engages in any illegal or unethical conduct. In such cases, the client will still be responsible for payment for any completed work.

items.title: Privacy and Data Protection
items.description: For information on how we collect and use your personal data, please refer to our Privacy Policy. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

items.title: Modifications to Terms and Conditions
items.description: LT Coding reserves the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be posted on our website, and the updated terms will be effective immediately upon publication. It is your responsibility to review these terms regularly.

items.title: Governing Law
items.description: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Armenia, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

items.title: Contact Us
items.description: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

Terms.summary: By using our website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions.

questions.question: What services do LT Coding offer?
questions.answer: We provide a wide range of web solutions, including front-end and back-end development, SEO services, custom web application development, e-commerce solutions, API integration, content management systems (CMS), and ongoing technical support. Our goal is to help businesses create seamless digital experiences.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete a web development project?
questions.answer: Timelines vary depending on project complexity, but a standard website typically takes 4–8 weeks from discovery to launch.

questions.question: Do you offer ongoing support after the website is launched?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your website remains up-to-date and secure.

questions.question: How much does a web development project cost?
questions.answer: Cost depends on the scope and complexity of the project, but typically ranges from $5,000 to $20,000.

questions.question: How can I get started with LT Coding?
questions.answer: Please visit our website to explore our services and get in touch with us for a free consultation. We look forward to helping you achieve your digital goals!

BookCall.description1: Thank you for choosing LT Coding! Follow the steps below to schedule a meeting with our team. Let’s Connect (30 Min).
BookCall.description2: Schedule a quick session with us to discuss your project needs and explore tailored solutions.
